emailReset.subject: Reset Password - Morlappo WMS
emailReset.title: Reset Password
emailReset.subtitle: Multi-Client Warehouse Management
emailReset.message: You have requested a password reset for your Morlappo WMS account.
emailReset.instruction: Click the button below to proceed with the password reset:
emailReset.linkInstruction: If the button doesn't work, copy and paste this link into your browser:
emailReset.validityText: This link is valid for 1 hour
emailReset.singleUseText: It can only be used once
emailReset.ignoreText: If you did not request this reset, please ignore this email
emailReset.supportText: If you have problems or questions, contact us at info@morlappo.com.
emailReset.legalAddress: Legal address: L.go Alvaro De Mendoza 4, 64027 Sant'Omero (TE)
emailReset.operativeAddress: Operative address: Via Braida 16, 35010 Villa Del Conte (PD)
emailReset.textMessage:
Reset Password - Morlappo WMS

Hello {userName},

You have requested a password reset for your Morlappo WMS account.

Click this link to proceed with the reset:
{resetUrl}

IMPORTANT:
- This link is valid for 1 hour
- It can only be used once
- If you did not request this reset, please ignore this email

For support: info@morlappo.com

MORLAPPO Srl
www.morlappo.com
